0.title: Entreprenote
0.description: Simplify team evaluation with our dedicated rating application for jury members.

details.team: Sharbel SEKIAS, Alexandre BRIONGOS, Romain FAGOT
description: Comming soon...

3.title: Pacmania
3.description: Experience the ultimate Pac-Man game with AI-powered gameplay between two players

details.team: Sharbel SEKIAS, Alexandre BRIONGOS, Romain FAGOT, Arnaud GUILLARD
description: Pac-Man game between two players.
Each Pac-Man uses an AI algorithm to eat dots.
Each Pac-Man will find the nearest dot to eat and the shortest way to take.
You can also play against AI (with a low probability of winning).

4.title: MyTodo
4.description: Effortlessly create to-do lists with our versatile web and console application.

description: With this application you can create and organize your To-do lists.
You need to create an account to be able to access the services.
Task Categories: Divids tasks into certain groups and can be assigned before or after creating the task.
You can add,edit and delete tasks or categories.
The application is available with an interface (GUI) and Command-line (CLI).
Built with Model–view–controller architecture.
Created a gitHub to track changes in the source code.

5.title: Internship project
5.description: Web application to replace EXCEL files with DataBase

description: This Web Application was created to replace Excel files by a real dataBase with the possibility to apply filters to the tables to get better results.
Develloped a script that automaticly insert data to the database using dynamic request from an Excel file.
The database contains vehicle’s details (brand, model, price..)
Possibility to add/modify or delete manualy certain data.
Used serverless architecture with netlify.
Applied the Agile software development method using Jira.
Created a gitlab to track changes in the source code.

6.title: AMU news
6.description: Web Application to read news and customize sections and sources with flux RSS

description: This Web Application was created to customize and read news (same idea as google news).
Sections are generated dynamically  by adding a link of the flux RSS.
Customize every section by choosing the name of the section, the number of articles to add, and the chronological order.
Search Bar to search an article from existing articles.

7.title: arXiv Organizer
7.description: Filter and save scientific articles with our powerful software application.

details.team: Sharbel SEKIAS, Cedric MASSAT, Nicolas *******, Anass EL AFYA
description: We have created a software applciation that helps regroup and filter scientific articles from the website arXiv to get better results.
With this application, we can apply the next filters: Category, Period, Authors, Keywords (in the title or the description).
Developed a favorites system to save articles for later.
Download one or many articles with a simple click.
Added some basic statistics tool to compare the number of articles for each author.
This application is available with an interface (GUI) or on line commande (CLI).
Applied the Agile software development method.
Created a gitLab to track changes in the source code and to be able to work on many branches as the same time.
Used Model–view–controller architecture.
JUnit testing in Java for each Class.
Used RobotFx testing for the GUI.

8.title: Dungeon Game
8.description: 2D dungeon game to save the world by defeating monsters and boss.

description: We have developed a Game using Java Oriented Language with JavaFx to have a simple interface.
The Game is formed from many rooms.
Each room is accessible via a door, and contains items and monsters.
Each new room has a stronger Monster.
Each time you kill a Monster you have to choose one out of three randomly generated items.
Items will help you win the game, so choose the right ones !
When you have no more HP, you will lose the game.
To save the World, you have to kill all the monstres and the BIG BOSS.

9.title: StudyPedia
9.description: An interactive platform for teachers and students to share and evaluate courses.

description: Web Application to access online courses.
You need to have an account, either as a teacher or student
Each teacher can upload multiple courses on this application.
Each student has access to all open-source courses.
Students can add courses to their favorite list.
Students can like a course and access the list of likers.
Students can find courses by checking the list of all teachers signed into the platform.
